title: 2,000,000 Incarcerated People. Thanks, Guys!
content:
Why are politicians so incompetent? Is it because they’re so badly paid? <!--more--> (In Singapore they receive pay commensurate with their equivalent in the private sector).
Patterns of warning are showing up and we discuss these.
America’s infrastructure is now critical.
More about ‘happiness’ as discussed in a new study.
More bank scandals involving secret bank accounts offshore.
A new ID document the ‘Internal Passport’ is to be rolled out this summer.
A book recommendation: Towards A World War III Scenario: The dangers Of Nuclear War by Michel Chossudovsky.
